title: How to Get Married in The Sims Bustin' Out (PS2)

steps.title: Know who you can marry.
steps.content: Know who you can marry. You can't marry any Sims the game created. You can only marry a person from the street, aka a "free" person.

steps.title: Know where you can get married.
steps.content: Know where you can get married. You are only allowed to be married in places that have the "Get Married" goal, and when you get married you must live in your current house.

steps.title: Wake your Sim up at around six AM.
steps.content: Wake your Sim up at around six AM.

steps.title: Send your Sim to shower and use the toilet.
steps.content: Send your Sim to shower and use the toilet. This way, you don't need to worry about interrupting interactions to send your Sim to the bathroom.

steps.title: Call your lover.
steps.content: Call your lover. Make sure the time is at least 7:00 AM. If it's not, then wait. You don't want them mad at you for waking them up!

steps.title: Serve them a breakfast.
steps.content: Serve them a breakfast. Be sure not to burn it. This will require you having at least decent cooking skills. If yours are lacking, read up on a cookbook to raise your level.

steps.title: Don't do anything.
steps.content: Don't do anything. Seems kind of backwards to the plan, yes, but refrain from television, radio, etc. for a few minutes. You may use the bathroom, though.

steps.title: Greet your lover.
steps.content: Greet your lover. This will establish, yet again, good relations between the two of you. It should be about 10 or 11 AM by now.

steps.title: Go eat lunch.
steps.content: Go eat lunch. It doesn't even matter if you order a pizza, just eat something. They must be following you to eat.

steps.title: Go to watch television.
steps.content: Go to watch television. Call them to you so that you can enjoy something together. Just make sure that you watch something that they like. Try a romantic show first, though.

steps.title: Use the toilet if you didn't before.
steps.content: Use the toilet if you didn't before. Do this while watching television. When you are done, call them in there.

steps.title: Leave your lover to use the bathroom.
steps.content: Leave your lover to use the bathroom. After two meals, they are probably in need of it, too, and you must be considerate!

steps.title: Go into the living room and call them.
steps.content: Go into the living room and call them. This will assure that you don't end up in the bathroom the whole time. This step is definitely optional.

steps.title: Be sweet to them.
steps.content: Be sweet to them. Give them a gift, kiss them, dance for them, etc.

steps.title: Propose to them.
steps.content: Propose to them. They should say yes, as long as whatever you just previously did was well reciprocated. You may have to do other things to get in their good graces if you upset them, however.
